• Professional Experience: 6+ years of industry experience with a demonstrated passion for crafting, analyzing, and deploying scalable machine learning solutions.

• Technical Proficiency:Coding: Expert-level proficiency in writing high-quality, well-documented, and tested code, with a strong preference for Python.
• Tooling: Hands-on experience with standard ML and orchestration tools like mlFlow, Airflow, and Docker.
